snippet: South Africa's President Jacob Zuma will not suspend the head of the prosecution service for laying and then withdrawing corruption charges against Finance Minister Pravin Gordhan, the presidency said on Friday....

headline.main: Trump Torture Remarks 'Lay Down Gauntlet' for Other States: U.N. Expert
headline.print_headline: Trump Torture Remarks 'Lay Down Gauntlet' for Other States: U.N. Expert

lead_paragraph: South Africa's President Jacob Zuma will not suspend the head of the prosecution service for laying and then withdrawing corruption charges against Finance Minister Pravin Gordhan, the presidency said on Friday.
